stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: Love the neatness of the splined canvas backs!
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: I have been using these canvas for 15+ years and the quality is unsurpassed. They don't warp and the splined backs prevent scratching the wall when they are hung. #sweepstakes
Good, sturdy frames for less than what it would cost to stretch them myself!

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: The best canvases for the best price!

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: Love the neatness of the splined canvas!

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: Splined canvases prevent scratching your walls!

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: Always great to have in the studio!

Some bulk packs normally have a cheap canvas with a very thin layer of gesso but these are well coated in gesso and are still sturdy canvases. I definitely recommend these even as a professional artist. #sweepstakes
This Bulk canvas pack is great, good quality and great value!

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: It's essential for me; will use again-&-again.
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: Great size for funky portrait-painting! Takes paint, marker, wax very well...Density, and canvas tooth work very well for me. Easy to store & access! Thank you!

Very inexpensive and they are just fine quality, not that I can tell the difference between high and low quality canvases but hey I like them #sweepstakes
Lucky I ordered this a little while ago. Everything seems to be going up.

This is a better quality canvas than the Blick Academic line of canvases, which have become rougher and rougher/less quality product over the years. The Blick Studio is smoother and less thirsty for acrylic painting. #sweepstakes

the canvas was loose on the frame, so not good

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: Canvas is not tight; hard to work with
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: I bought 3 16x16 primed linen panels. They each had corners that were "wavy" and sagged. I inserted the keys tightly, sprayed the backs with hot water, and even re-primed the canvases. I got minimal improvement, but still did not create a tight surface.l I do not feeI should have to restretch a canvas that is sold as stretched and primed. Disappointed.

The linen canvas provides a smooth surface for fine detail
I have always been very happy with Blick studio linen stretched canvases.
Great product
I purchased this stretched canvas for a commission oil on canvas. Blick's stretched canvas is affordable and great quality.
I'm a little disappointed that the. canvas came a little warped. Its not insanely obvious but I am very particular about stretcher bars not being bowed.
This canvas is wonderful to paint on. Well stretched and primed- very high quality

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: A perfect big canvas to work on
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: I always buy Fredrix Red Label because the struts on the back are angled so you can hang it on a nail anytime you want, I always buy 3/4 inch canvas with so I can lean twice as many against the wall for storage, and not as heavy to carry around. I'm glad that Fredrix is finally making larger sizes and I hope one day they'll do 48×48
It's my basic go to size and I always buy Fredrix Red Label because the struts on the back are angled so you can hang it on a nail anytime I want.

stretched_canvas_reviews.product: Fredrix Pro Series Dixie Cotton Canvas
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: came broken. horibble canvas quailty!
im using the product for a full size vertical painting of mick jagger of the rolling stones singing.

The fine texture is great for portraits and detailed work. The paint flows much more easily over this surface compared to acrylic primed canvas. The canvas is tightly stretched and the stretcher bars are lightweight but strong. I hope they will offer it with a white surface in the future as that is my preference. However, the cream colored primer is fairly light.
Great canvas for oil painting. I love seeing the texture of this woven product in my paintings
One of the wooden braces came loose and I had to nail it back in
These are working well for my series of paintings.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: Good value, and the smooth surface I'm after
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: Love the smooth texture of this linen and so far I've ordered 7 of these in various sizes and everything I've received has been tight as a drum and stayed that way. The priming is yellowed so I just apply an extra layer of Gamblin oil ground and it's good to go in 2 weeks. I will always add a layer of primer to any pre-made supports anyway so this is not an issue.
Portrait artist. Triple oil primed linen takes the "tooth" off the canvas. Sooo nice

We'll be emailing you to offer assistance, or you can call 1-800-933-2542 (8am-5:30pm CST M-F) or email info@dickblick.com. We look forward to working with you!

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with this canvas. We're sorry it didn't meet your expectations, and we are happy that one of our Customer Care Agents was able to assist you with a return. Your satisfaction is important to us!
We're sorry to hear that there were problems with some of the canvases you received from us. Please look for an email from a member of our Customer Care Team who will be following up to assist you.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: I by these periodically whenever I run out of them.

The canvases were loose on the frame. I ordered over 50 of them.
This is a great colored canvas for doing my space / ocean paintings. It saves a ton of ink / paint for the base. #sweepstakes
Love working with a black canvas for extra depth
I use blick black cotton canvas with oil paint. Excellent surface for oils. Very nice weave.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: Perfect gift for your art classmates
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: Bought this for my fellow artists - such a great experience to paint n black. I love to give my classmates a Xmas gift that enhances their abilities!
I will be using these for pouring paint projects. I love black canvas and all the sizes you carry, too.

I am using these for pastel! I have used them as they came and also by priming with pastel ground. I have used pan pastels, hard and soft pastels and charcoal. Love them because I instantly have my darkest dark!

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: I would definitely buy this product again.
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: I am teaching a sm class to do a black and white painting of a forest. It is better and easier because the canvas is already black
I use this black canvas for black and white paintings.
This canvas is the only one I trust to use for my portraits. The wonderful smooth surface makes all the difference.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: Nothing better than the Blue Label
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: I am a 95 year old artist who has been using Fredrix Blue Label canvases since around 1975. And I am still using them. and now they are continue to be used by all 6 of my current students. Yes, at my age the Fredix Blue label is the canvas of choice and all my students were taught that from their start of lessons. I have taught over 80 students.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: Excellent Canvas and easy to gesso for a smooth finish
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: I have been searching for an affordable quality canvas for some time. I normally work on Masonite, but recently I have started working on canvas because of the light weight and ease of this ground. I just did a four more coats of gesso on the Fredrix Blue label cotton Canvas and sanded it down to a smooth finish, it was incredibly easy to do! Now I have light weight and a smooth surface to work on. I always used Fredrix years and years ago in my college days and had no idea they were still around. I am glad to see they are and producing quality canvas. #sweepstakes
Professional, lightweight, well stretched canvases.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: I would purchase this product again.
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: I purchased this canvas to do a pencil charcoal portrait, it worked really well.

I use the Fredix Blue Label for smaller portraits and paintings where I need a bit more control in paint application. The Blue Label has plenty of "tooth," but allows for a smooth application of paints.
This brand was recommended by my teacher. She is happy with the quality of that canvas. I am as well.

This has become my "go to" canvas. These are made very well and they are sturdy. The canvas is super smooth and does need an additional coat of gesso. Takes the paint superbly whether doing abstract palate knife with cold wax or detail work.

I have been using Fredrix red label for year. I thought I would try blue to see if I liked the tighter weave. To me there is not much difference. These canvases are of good quality and ready for painting.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: I buy it over and over again
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: I really love this, Canvas, because of the smooth surface. It makes detail so much easier to achieve. I have been using it for years.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: A real step up for my granddaughter.
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: My granddaughter has just started painting and is loving it. She was thrilled to receive these canvases as she has been using cardboard boxes. I love watching her enjoy something so much. She has already painted some very nice pictures with the canvassing.
This product is wonderful. Quality, excellent value for price

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: I would buy this product again and would recommend.
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: I have no complaints about these canvases. I used them for acrylic and oil paintings and they took the paint well and the finished product look fine. I got these due to there size and a painting project I was working on . #sweepstakes
Glad I caught this sale for quality product

Hello, I have been using these Canvases for years for all my custom work. They are a decent size for shipping, keeping the cost down. Great price and I get 5 to boot, my customers have been totally satisfied.

I primarily paint on wood pieces so I was eager to try painting on stretched canvases. I was pleasantly surprised at how well heavy body acrylic paint felt on the canvas. I would recommend these canvases for anyone who wants to try out a different medium. artPOP! provided product for free to try and review.

These canvas are perfect for any student, or fun DIY project! The cost per panel is a lot cheaper than going to an art store + buying 1, and the quality is great. Would recommend for any simple projects, art class, etc!

These canvases are great for their price! They came in wonderful condition and were ready to use right out of the package. My paints spread across them easily and fully. Good to have on hand for smaller projects.

These are very affordable for their quality. I was really impressed that these arrived in the mail undamaged and ready for use. I went ahead and gessoed them, but they're ready to go when you get 'em. Great deal and held paint well. I enjoy the square size since I primarily post my work to my Instagram and the orientation works well.
Amazing product. Great quality canvas material for an even better value. 10/10

stretched_canvas_reviews.product: Old Holland Claessens Oil Primed Belgian Linen Canvas
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: One of the best canvases. I love the texture and how finely it woven, works great for highly detailed areas. #sweepstakes

stretched_canvas_reviews.product: Old Holland Claessens Oil Primed Belgian Linen Canvas
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: I was very happy to discover I could order a canvas pre-stretched with Claessens linen. I ordered a 24 x 36 canvas. It arrived ahead of time, in great condition. The stretcher bars are reinforced with cross bars, very sturdy, hefty, and square. The canvas was a bit loose in one corner, (which is to be expected with changes in temperature during shipping), but I had no problem straightening it out, tight as a drum, when I applied the keys to the bars in the back. The linen is a nice medium texture. Excellent quality for a good price.

stretched_canvas_reviews.product: Old Holland Claessens Oil Primed Belgian Linen Canvas
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: I liked the idea of it, but was a little disappointed, expecting a tighter canvas and surface.

stretched_canvas_reviews.product: Old Holland Claessens Oil Primed Belgian Linen Canvas
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: I would not buy this product again.
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: Thank you for taking the time to share your candid feedback. We're sorry to hear that these canvases were frustrating for you. Changes in humidity can cause the canvas to slacken at any time, so a canvas that's well-stretched by the manufacturer may be taut in our warehouse and looser when it arrives to you. Although the inevitability of tension changes in stretched canvases is the reason these frames are "keyable" (so they can be tightened as needed), it's not our intention that you ever be disappointed in a Blick purchase. We see that one of our Customer Care Agents has already worked out a solution with you, and we appreciate your time and comments!

stretched_canvas_reviews.product: Old Holland Claessens Oil Primed Belgian Linen Canvas
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: Don't know if I will purchase again.
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: We apologize for the issues you had with this canvas. Although changes in humidity are usually the cause of loose canvas, we're happy to replace any that you find to be unusable. Or, for guidance on how to best correct slack canvas and maintain a taut surface, please feel welcome to get in touch with our Product Information Team. Product Specialists are available weekdays from 8am to 5:30pm CST at 1-800-933-2542 or info@dickblick.com, and they'll be glad to help!

stretched_canvas_reviews.product: Old Holland Claessens Oil Primed Belgian Linen Canvas
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: One of Two Linen Canvases Arrived too Loose
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: Thank you for taking the time to share your candid feedback. We're sorry to hear that these canvases were frustrating for you. Linen is temperamental when it comes to slackening in arid conditions, so you can imagine February is when a lot of artists are dealing with this issue. Although the inevitability of tension changes in stretched canvases is the reason these frames are "keyable" (so they can be tightened as needed), it's not our intention that you ever be disappointed in a Blick purchase. If we can be of assistance, please don't hesitate to give our Customer Care Team a call at 1-800-723-2787.

stretched_canvas_reviews.product: Old Holland Claessens Oil Primed Belgian Linen Canvas
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: very happy with the quality of the linen and the priming is nicely done.

stretched_canvas_reviews.product: Old Holland Claessens Oil Primed Belgian Linen Canvas

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: Very nice canvas, high quality all-around. #sweepstakes

stretched_canvas_reviews.product: Old Holland Claessens Oil Primed Belgian Linen Canvas
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: Thank you for your review. Actually, keys work quite well when properly used and are an essential tool when working with stretched linen due to the dimensional changes that occur readily in linen fibers. Although it's true that restretching is the only alternative to keys for re-tensioning an oil-primed linen, we're happy to help you avoid that. Product Specialists are available weekdays from 8am to 5:30pm CST at 1-800-933-2542 or info@dickblick.com, and they'll be glad to assist you!

stretched_canvas_reviews.product: Old Holland Claessens Oil Primed Belgian Linen Canvas

Good quality canvas for the money.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: I would purchase this product again.
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: These are the best canvases! Your prices are awesome!

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: Great Cotton Canvas surface to paint on!
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: Excellent Stretched Canvas surface on which to paint my creations! You can rely on Dick Blick to have the best artist materials!
Go to these gallery wrapped canvases and save the expense, bulk and added shipping weight of frames.
These canvases are nicely wrapped and taut . They do not shift or slack. You can just start creating with no worry.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: I would buy this product again and again!
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: Fredrick's is a name, in canvases, for a very , very long time. These did not disappoint. Blick's shipped them quickly and the box was well packed and sealed. Looking forward to getting to using them , very soon, in my studio.
good quality,
I'm an artist. The canvases were just what I needed.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: Solid value for a pre-stretched canvas
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: A solid professional canvas. You can't see from any photos here or anywhere online I've looked but there is a cross brace on at least some of the canvases. Mine are 24 x 30 inches and have one crossbar for support. Adequate extra canvas should you need to restretch. Corner folds good not great. Stretch is quite tight. Plenty of staples. Canvas looks to me like Fredrix Yankee, good tooth, fairly heavy, and though only 2 coats of gesso I've not noticed any bleed-through even with pours. Comes with wooden keys for the corners but some are too thick for the slots, the only knock. You could do a little better on some of these points but you'd pay 75% more.
Painter 🎨 , quality canvas for high end clients
Love the shape of these ones. A little more fun for ideas long ways
Love these little guys for my paintings. Endless ideas!

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: I would buy this product again

Can an artist have too many canvases? I don't think so. These will make lovely gifts.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: Love the product, very sturdy.

stretched_canvas_reviews.product: Fredrix Convexo Round and Oval Stretched Canvas
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: I wish they were cheaper because I would have bought more.

stretched_canvas_reviews.product: Fredrix Convexo Round and Oval Stretched Canvas
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: As a professional artist I really like the bevel on the sides of this canvas. Of course you can paint around the sides of any normally stretched canvas, but the bevel sort of sloping into the wall when hung makes for a very nicely finished look.

stretched_canvas_reviews.product: Fredrix Convexo Round and Oval Stretched Canvas
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: Convex canvas brings artwork to an entirely different level by allowing art to flow out onto gently curving edges. A little more expensive than regular flat canvas but no need to buy additional frame. Creates beautiful image.
Haven't used yet but canvas appears to be perfect fir accepting paint.
I love the tightness of the canvas and the fact that plastic bottles were saved from a landfill, way to go Liquitex!
Got a couple of 5x7s for acrylic paintings. Feels the exact same as the traditional stretched canvas. Nice depth that I think I'll incorporate into my next painting.

I have no complaints about this canvas. Excellent for a mixed media project, the canvas was stiff and slightly textured, but texture didn't negatively impact the end result. Liquitex is an industry standard for a reason!

I used this canvas to paint a quick little painting for my granddaughter. It's a very firm canvas that my paints took to very well. I really enjoyed using this product and will definitely purchase and use again.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: You'd never know its made out of plastic bottles
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: This canvas feels & paints just like regular regular canvas. I love the fact that is made out of recycled plastic bottles. You'd think it would easily absorb the paint but it totally does. You won't regret purchasing this canvas!

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: What a great way to recycle!
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: I am shocked by this canvas. It feels and acts just like fabric but it's recycled bottles! It came pre-primed. The paint adheres well. I really like the overall value and outcome of the painting. I'll definitely be buying this canvas and other recycled material based supplies in the future.

The Liquitex recycled canvas is a great product and I will be purchasing this canvas over the non recycled canvas from now on. The canvas itself is high quality and it produces quality paintings. The paint glides on very smoothly and feels just like a regular cotton canvas.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: Helping the planet one artwork at a time
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: I wasn't expecting the Liquitex Recycled Canvas to be as high quality as it was. I love that it's made from recycled bottles and FSC certified wood, and even the label is recycled content and all packaging is fully recyclable ! It comes already primed which made it easy to get started. It's a bit heavier weight cloth than regular canvas, but I actually liked that better, since I am using a mix of regular acrylic, heavy body acrylic, and some other media on this piece. Unfortunately due to a health issue I have not been able to work on the piece much to show any photos ( it is also going to be a surprise gift). Liquitex has made a great product, one that I will be using exclusively from now on. You can feel good that you're going to create great artwork and also do your bit to help get plastic out of the ecosystem.
This canvas was such amazing quality! It was sturdy and had a little bit of weight to it which I personally prefer. You can definitely tell how well this was made and I'm going to be buying more!

stretched_canvas_reviews.product: Masterpiece Artfix Oil Primed Linen Canvas
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: It was loose and wobbly looking. I looked on line how to tighten the loose canvas. I sprayed water behind the canvas and overnight it went tight, no loose corners. It is a strong canvas.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: I buy these canvases all the time
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: I use this product for portrait art. I find the weave is consistent, although uniform. When you take hi res photos of your art you will see the weave lines. Just a heads up. This product is still my go to canvas because the tightening system in the back works fantastic. All you need is a screw driver - no need to hammer with a nail. I am a professional artist and I find this canvas does a good job for me.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: The Worst - Could be a one off. If not, don't waste money!
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: We're sorry to learn that this canvas isn't performing as we would expect. We're happy to work with you to make this right. One of our Customer Care Representatives will be contacting you via email to see how we can help.

I'm not a huge fan of Winsor & Newton, especially since they've been bought out by the ColArt Group. But I have to admit, their stretched cotton canvas is the best you can get. If you want better quality than this, you'll be stretching your own. My biggest problem with pre-stretched canvas has always been canvas tightness. I like my canvas nice and tight. I don't want it wiggling around while I'm trying to paint. This canvas is relatively tight right out of the package. And it comes with these cool adjustable wedges. These wedges take it to the next level. So if you work on cotton canvas, and you prefer to buy pre-stretched, I highly recommend that you give this product a try.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: Good canvas... but Pro stretchers do not fit
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: Thank you for reaching out! The Pro-Stretchers do not work in the 8" x 10" canvas you ordered, so the only one that should have had these was the 11" x 14". We're sorry they didn't fit the canvas you received, and we've forwarded your comments to our buyer to share with Winsor & Newton. Please consider getting in touch with our Product Information Department for further assistance. They can be reached at info@dickblick.com or 1-800-933-2542 between 8am and 5:30pm CST Monday through Friday, and they're happy to troubleshoot!
Quality made canvas. Great shape. Hard to make this at home.
It's a beautiful easel, easy to work with. Love it. It did come with a missing wing nut and they got me one within 2 weeks, customer service was great! #sweepstakes
Used this for a 20" floral painting for a workout room. The only downside is the canvas is barely .5" deep. I wish it was deeper for frameless hanging.
I love this brand for round canvases. It is one of the best options I have found to get round canvases.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: I would buy this product again.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: Perfection in the round Sacred Geometry on Round Canvas
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: How wonderful to have a round canvas by Dick Blick! I do Celtic interlaces and other sacred geometric designs with ancient symbols like runes and now I can START with the round rather than having to construct it from scratch! This could be a beginning of working many more round canvasses... #sweepstakes

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: Weird little almost-circle canvas. But still ok.
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: This was weird. Canvas is stretched & edges glued to a pressed wood disc. The 10" one was round, but the 5" looked like a struggle occurred. Little bit wrinkly on glued edge and the disc had a flat part like they couldn't quite cut a perfectly round pressed wood disc. I think framing might solve the aesthetic wobble. Will keep because it is too cheap to return & it's so tiny it's not worth the carbon footprint a return would entail. Fredrix is my go to canvas. Normally they provide perfect canvases. This wasn't so bad. Just a little bit bad.

Commercially made canvases do typically have the bars stapled, but the staples are expected to be removed to tension the canvas as needed. This retensioning is very often needed with linen in the arid winter months, and we're sorry if this is not what you expected. Blick's Product Specialists have loads of tips for maintaining a taut surface and they'd love to share them with you! You can reach them by phone at 1-800-933-2542 (weekdays 8am to 5:30pm CST) or email at info@dickblick.com.

stretched_canvas_reviews.review_title: I would not buy this product again
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: Thank you for your review. We did receive your returned canvases and inspected them to find no pinholes in either size. However, fine linens often have an open weave where light can shine through the priming. In addition, in fine weaves it's not unusual for the priming to penetrate and show white spots on the back of the fabric, but since the canvas has been sized (and the sizing is clear), there is no harm to the linen fibers. Both characteristics are sometimes mistaken for pinholes, but they are not holes and not flaws. Nonetheless, we welcome you to return any item that does not meet your expectations. That's our 100% Satisfaction Guarantee!

stretched_canvas_reviews.product: Fredrix Pro Series Belgian Linen Canvas
stretched_canvas_reviews.review_desc: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on this canvas. Changes in humidity can cause canvas, especially linen, to slacken at any time, so a canvas that's well-stretched by the manufacturer may be taut in our warehouse and looser when it arrives to you. The canvas may re-tighten on its own with time, or you can tighten the canvas using the corner keys provided for this purpose. For guidance on how to maintain a taut surface, please feel welcome to get in touch with our Product Information Team. Product Specialists are available weekdays from 8am to 5:30pm CST at 1-800-933-2542 or info@dickblick.com, and they'll be glad to help!

We’re sorry to hear that your experience with this canvas has been an unhappy one. Changes in humidity can cause the canvas to slacken, and you can tighten the canvas using the corner keys that are pre-installed in the stretcher frame for this purpose. If the wood frame is warped, the best place to start is by removing any tensioning keys you’ve inserted and move the canvases away from any source of humidity. The frame may straighten if some stress that's causing it to bow can be removed, but it’s not uncommon with warped canvases that the canvas fabric must be removed and put on new stretcher bars. Our Product Information Team is more than happy to assist with the materials and techniques you would need. I use this for oil and the canvas is nice and solid, not too springy. It's a plus that the canvas is flush with the edges as it makes it easier to paint and embellish. Will definitely buy again
I create artwork with oval canvases.
